abstract: The company placed new executives in charge of operations facing fierce new competition from Google, Apple and cellphone makers.
snippet: The company placed new executives in charge of operations facing fierce new competition from Google, Apple and cellphone makers.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft announced a sweeping shake-up of its executive ranks Thursday, placing new executives over operations facing fierce new competition from Google, Apple and cellphone makers.

byline.original: By Saul Hansell and John Markoff

abstract: As it continues to push for its $44.6 billion unsolicited bid for Yahoo, Microsoft announced a sweeping shake-up of its executive ranks Thursday, placing new executives over operations facing fierce new competition from Google, Apple and cellphone makers.
lead_paragraph: As it continues to push for its $44.6 billion unsolicited bid for Yahoo, Microsoft announced a sweeping shake-up of its executive ranks Thursday, placing new executives over operations facing fierce new competition from Google, Apple and cellphone makers.
